mapper.select: SELECT p.taskId , p.publishTime, p.publisherId, s.taskId "simpletask.taskId", s.taskDesc "simpletask.taskDesc", s.locationDesc "simpletask.locationDesc", s.bonus "simpletask.bonus", s.duration "simpletask.duration", s.state "simpletask.state" FROM publish p INNER JOIN simpletask s on p.taskId = s.taskId WHERE p.taskId = #{taskId}

SELECT p.publishId, p.taskId, p.publishTime, p.publisherId, s.taskId "simpletask.taskId", s.taskDesc "simpletask.taskDesc", s.locationDesc "simpletask.locationDesc", s.bonus "simpletask.bonus", s.duration "simpletask.duration", s.state "simpletask.state" FROM publish p INNER JOIN simpletask s on p.taskId = s.taskId WHERE p.publisherId = #{publisherId} ORDER BY p.publishId
